resources.string: Thank you for participating in the BATO study!\n\nThere will be a brief setup process in which you configure the app for the rest of the week!
An important part of this program involves thinking about the most important areas of your life.
This life area refers to the part of your life that involves family, friends, and your romantic partner
This life area refers to time spent developing your education and career
This life area refers to leisure time
This life area refers to both physical and mental health as well as religion and/or spirituality
This life area refers to your obligiations and responsibilities to other and your belongings
The Life Areas, Values, and Activities Inventory allows you to turn your values across key areas of your life into a reality!
First, fill out 3 values and 5 activities for the life area RELATIONSHIP. Rate each activity for both enjoyment and importance
Enter a value. e.g., being a good husband or wife
First, fill out 3 values and 5 activities for the life area EDUCATION/CAREER. Rate each activity for both enjoyment and importance
Enter a value. e.g., learning new skils for work
First, fill out 3 values and 5 activities for the life area RECREATION/INTERESTS. Rate each activity for both enjoyment and importance
Enter a value. e.g., being active
First, fill out 3 values and 5 activities for the life area MIND/BODY/SPIRITUALITY. Rate each activity for both enjoyment and importance
Enter a value. e.g., being physically healthy
First, fill out 3 values and 5 activities for the life area DAILY RESPONSIBILIIES. Rate each activity for both enjoyment and importance
Enter a value. e.g., being organized

Every day, you will be sent a reminder in the morning to set your daily goals. Your daily goals will be 5 of the activities that you just listed. You will also be sent a reminder in evening to make sure your daily diary is complete. Please set the times at which you want the reminders to be sent.

Last step! Many of the activities you listed earlier can be difficult to accomplish. For the reason, it\'s helpful to think of people you know that can help you out. Given that, please list 5 people you know that could help with some of the activities you listed, if it any point during the week you feel like you\'re having trouble with your activities
Click here to finish the set-up!
See the activities for this value
write a positive thought to destroy the negative thought
Total number of negative thoughts destroyed
